panels.content:
## Bundles deployments

Here we show the deployments for the big data bundles as reported by the charmstore.

## Deployments of Bigtop charms

Bigtop charms are built using the binaries produced by bigtop. The metrics shown are gathered from the charmstore.

## Deployments of apache charms

These charms are built using binaries we compile. The metrics shown are gathered from the charmstore.

## Yesterdays active deployments 

Here we show the active deployments we saw yesterday on the logs of the charmstore.
